image_prompt: Generate a Blizzard Concept Artists Styled fantasy landscape featuring Elenor and Asher standing in front of the Mysterious Witch. They are both casting magical spells at her, with the Magical Fox aiding from a distance. Include glowing magical energy radiating from both Elenor and Asher's hands, powerful lightning bolts from the Witch, and mystical effects from the Magical Fox.
scene: Elenor and Asher take the offensive, casting powerful spells at the Witch. The Magical Fox aids from a distance, providing back up when needed.
choices: Elenor and Asher cast their strongest spells and hope that it is enough to defeat the Witch.
Asher bravely charges forward, distracting the Witch while Elenor gets a chance to think of a new plan.
